verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶ֧ל <WH413> and to אֶלְעָזָ֛ר <WH499> and unto Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> Take אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣אשׁ ׀ <WH7218> the sum כָּל־ <WH3605> of all עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> of all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> years וָמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> and upward לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> throughout their fathers' כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> all that are able to go צָבָ֖א <WH6635> to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <WH499> and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> the priest אֹתָ֖ם <WH854> in בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> with them in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [Take the sum of the people] from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the eldest יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> son of Israel בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children רְאוּבֵ֗ן <WH7205> of Reuben חֲנוֹךְ֙ <WH2585> Hanoch מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> [of whom cometh] the family הַחֲנֹכִ֔י <WH2599> of the Hanochites לְפַלּ֕וּא <WH6396> of Pallu מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַפַּלֻּאִֽי׃ <WH6384> of the Palluites

לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <WH2696> Of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַֽחֶצְרוֹנִ֑י <WH2697> of the Hezronites לְכַרְמִ֕י <WH3756> of Carmi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַכַּרְמִֽי׃ <WH3757> of the Carmites

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> These [are] the families הָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֑י <WH7206> of the Reubenites וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become פְקֻדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6485> and they that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> and three וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> of them were forty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> and seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> and thirty
וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons פַלּ֖וּא <WH6396> of Pallu אֱלִיאָֽב׃ <WH446> Eliab

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons אֱלִיאָ֔ב <WH446> of Eliab נְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH5241> Nemuel וְדָתָ֣ן <WH1885> and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֑ם <WH48> and Abiram הֽוּא־ <WH1931> These דָתָ֨ן <WH1885> This [is that] Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <WH48> and Abiram [קְרוּאֵי כ] (קְרִיאֵ֣י <WH7148> famous ק) הָעֵדָ֗ה <WH5712> in the congregation אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הִצּ֜וּ <WH5327> who strove עַל־ <WH5921> against מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> and against אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> and against Aaron בַּעֲדַת־ <WH5712> in the company קֹ֔רַח <WH7141> of Korah בְּהַצֹּתָ֖ם <WH5327> when they strove עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> against the LORD

וַתִּפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> opened הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> And the earth אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֗יהָ <WH6310> her mouth וַתִּבְלַ֥ע <WH1104> and swallowed them up אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH854> with קֹ֖רַח <WH7141> together with Korah בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> died הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> when that company בַּאֲכֹ֣ל <WH398> devoured הָאֵ֗שׁ <WH784> what time the fire אֵ֣ת <WH853> חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <WH3967> two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> became לְנֵֽס׃ <WH5251> and they became a sign
וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> Notwithstanding the children קֹ֖רַח <WH7141> of Korah לֹא־ <WH3808> did not מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> died ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons שִׁמְעוֹן֮ <WH8095> of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> after their families לִנְמוּאֵ֗ל <WH5241> of Nemuel מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> the family הַנְּמ֣וּאֵלִ֔י <WH5242> of the Nemuelites לְיָמִ֕ין <WH3226> of Jamin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַיָּמִינִ֑י <WH3228> of the Jaminites לְיָכִ֕ין <WH3199> of Jachin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַיָּכִינִֽי׃ <WH3200> of the Jachinites
לְזֶ֕רַח <WH2226> Of Zerah מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> of the Zarhites לְשָׁא֕וּל <WH7586> of Shaul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַשָּׁאוּלִֽי׃ <WH7587> of the Shaulites

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> These [are] the families הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֑י <WH8099> of the Simeonites שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> and two וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> twenty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> and two hundred ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children גָד֮ <WH1410> of Gad לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> after their families לִצְפ֗וֹן <WH6827> of Zephon מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> the family הַצְּפוֹנִ֔י <WH6831> of the Zephonites לְחַגִּ֕י <WH2291> of Haggi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַֽחַגִּ֑י <WH2291> of the Haggites לְשׁוּנִ֕י <WH7764> of Shuni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַשּׁוּנִֽי׃ <WH7765> of the Shunites
לְאָזְנִ֕י <WH244> Of Ozni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָאָזְנִ֑י <WH244> of the Oznites לְעֵרִ֕י <WH6179> of Eri מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָעֵרִֽי׃ <WH6180> of the Erites
לַאֲר֕וֹד <WH720> Of Arod מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָאֲרוֹדִ֑י <WH722> of the Arodites לְאַ֨רְאֵלִ֔י <WH692> of Areli מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH692> of the Arelites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> These [are] the families בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> according to those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> of them forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah עֵ֣ר <WH6147> [were] Er וְאוֹנָ֑ן <WH209> and Onan וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died עֵ֛ר <WH6147> and Er וְאוֹנָ֖ן <WH209> and Onan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons יְהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> after their families לְשֵׁלָ֗ה <WH7956> were of Shelah מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> the family הַשֵּׁ֣לָנִ֔י <WH8024> of the Shelanites לְפֶ֕רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַפַּרְצִ֑י <WH6558> of the Pharzites לְזֶ֕רַח <WH2226> of Zerah מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַזַּרְחִֽי׃ <WH2227> of the Zarhites

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons פֶ֔רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <WH2696> were of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַֽחֶצְרֹנִ֑י <WH2697> of the Hezronites לְחָמ֕וּל <WH2538> of Hamul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הֶחָמוּלִֽי׃ <WH2539> of the Hamulites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> These [are] the families יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> according to those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> six וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <WH7657> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> [Of] the sons יִשָּׂשכָר֙ <WH3485> of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם <WH4940> after their families תּוֹלָ֕ע <WH8439> [of] Tola מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַתּוֹלָעִ֑י <WH8440> of the Tolaites לְפֻוָ֕ה <WH6312> of Pua מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַפּוּנִֽי׃ <WH6324> of the Punites

לְיָשׁ֕וּב <WH3437> Of Jashub מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַיָּשׁוּבִ֑י <WH3432> of the Jashubites לְשִׁמְרֹ֕ן <WH8110> of Shimron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַשִּׁמְרֹנִֽי׃ <WH8117> of the Shimronites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> These [are] the families יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> of Issachar לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> according to those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> and four וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <WH8346> of them threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [Of] the sons זְבוּלֻן֮ <WH2074> of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> after their families לְסֶ֗רֶד <WH5624> of Sered מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> the family הַסַּרְדִּ֔י <WH5625> of the Sardites לְאֵל֕וֹן <WH356> of Elon מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָאֵלֹנִ֑י <WH440> of the Elonites לְיַ֨חְלְאֵ֔ל <WH3177> of Jahleel מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַיַּחְלְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH3178> of the Jahleelites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> These [are] the families הַזְּבוּלֹנִ֖י <WH2075> of the Zebulunites לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> according to those that were numbered שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> of them threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> after their families מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> [were] Manasseh וְאֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> and Ephraim

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the sons מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לְמָכִיר֙ <WH4353> of Machir מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> the family הַמָּכִירִ֔י <WH4354> of the Machirites וּמָכִ֖יר <WH4353> and Machir הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead לְגִלְעָ֕ד <WH1568> of Gilead מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> [come] the family הַגִּלְעָדִֽי׃ <WH1569> of the Gileadites

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the sons גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead אִיעֶ֕זֶר <WH372> [of] Jeezer מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָאִֽיעֶזְרִ֑י <WH373> of the Jeezerites לְחֵ֕לֶק <WH2507> of Helek מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַֽחֶלְקִֽי׃ <WH2516> of the Helekites

וְאַ֨שְׂרִיאֵ֔ל <WH844> And [of] Asriel מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָֽאַשְׂרִֽאֵלִ֑י <WH845> of the Asrielites וְשֶׁ֕כֶם <WH7928> and [of] Shechem מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַשִּׁכְמִֽי׃ <WH7930> of the Shechemites

וּשְׁמִידָ֕ע <WH8061> And [of] Shemida מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַשְּׁמִידָעִ֑י <WH8062> of the Shemidaites וְחֵ֕פֶר <WH2660> and [of] Hepher מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַֽחֶפְרִֽי׃ <WH2662> of the Hepherites

וּצְלָפְחָ֣ד <WH6765> And Zelophehad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵ֗פֶר <WH2660> of Hepher לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> had ל֛וֹ בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> had no sons כִּ֣י <WH3588> but אִם־ <WH518> only בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> but daughters וְשֵׁם֙ <WH8034> and the names בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters צְלָפְחָ֔ד <WH6765> of Zelophehad מַחְלָ֣ה <WH4244> [were] Mahlah וְנֹעָ֔ה <WH5270> and Noah חָגְלָ֥ה <WH2295> Hoglah מִלְכָּ֖ה <WH4435> Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> and Tirzah

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> These [are] the families מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וּפְקֻ֣דֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6485> and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> and two וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> of them fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> and seven מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> These [are] the sons אֶפְרַיִם֮ <WH669> of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> after their families לְשׁוּתֶ֗לַח <WH7803> of Shuthelah מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> the family הַשֻּׁ֣תַלְחִ֔י <WH8364> of the Shuthalhites לְבֶ֕כֶר <WH1071> of Becher מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַבַּכְרִ֑י <WH1076> of the Bachrites לְתַ֕חַן <WH8465> of Tahan מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הַֽתַּחֲנִֽי׃ <WH8470> of the Tahanites
וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And these [are] the sons שׁוּתָ֑לַח <WH7803> of Shuthelah לְעֵרָ֕ן <WH6197> of Eran מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> the family הָעֵרָנִֽי׃ <WH6198> of the Eranites

לָרַ֗ב <WH7227> To many תַּרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> thou shalt give the more נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> inheritance וְלַמְעַ֕ט <WH4592> and to few תַּמְעִ֖יט <WH4591> thou shalt give the less נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> inheritance אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> to every one לְפִ֣י <WH6310> according פְקֻדָ֔יו <WH6485> to those that were numbered יֻתַּ֖ן <WH5414> be given נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> shall his inheritance

עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּי֙ <WH6310> According הַגּוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> to the lot תֵּחָלֵ֖ק <WH2505> thereof be divided נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> shall the possession בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between רַ֖ב <WH7227> between many לִמְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> and few ס

וּבְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָ֣יָה <WH1961> become אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> But among these there was not a man מִפְּקוּדֵ֣י <WH6485> numbered מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of them whom Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who פָּקְד֛וּ <WH6485> when they numbered אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> of Sinai

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמַ֤ר <WH559> had said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD לָהֶ֔ם מ֥וֹת <WH4191> of them They shall surely יָמֻ֖תוּ <WH4191> die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not נוֹתַ֤ר <WH3498> And there was not left מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> and not אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> a man כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo כָּלֵ֣ב <WH3612> of them save Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נֽוּן׃ <WH5126> of Nun ס
